Reviews: while I was getting my car serviced here I decided to wait in the sales lounge which was very nice and clean inside and cool. I felt welcomed right away. I had a question about getting tint for my windows which was answered very well even though they do not offer that service. After sitting down I was offered a bottle of water which was very cold! I will definitely be back to this dealership

This is by far the best dealership I've experienced. Jerry Moore and Ray Frazier are sincere professionals who strive to please their customers. They go above and beyond to make sure the vehicle fits the customer.
